Quite a decent meal despite the poor rating of 2.0 stars at the point of my review - but fair play as well since I witnessed the staff telling the customer ahead of me to tell her in advance should she wants to have her noodles non-separated, since their default is to separate the noodles and soup (though it wasnâ€™t written anywhere).

Worker was unhappy my small request of separating my fried fish to my bowl of pao fan and couldnâ€™t fulfill my request. If such a simple request canâ€™t be done then I donâ€™t believe this stall should survive in the fnb space.
